title: New: Sasha – Headlights
body:
Another slice of dreamy, emotional pop from London’s Sasha.

With a string of singles released this year, her latest, Headlights, feels like her boldest step forward thus far. With noticeable head nods to The Japanese House, Wet and Maggie Rogers, this is undoubtedly her most confident, complete songwriting yet. Check it out below. Sasha plays a headline show at Servant Jazz Quarters on 28 November, [tickets here](https://www.iamsashamusic.com/events/a8c2cc30-811d-0135-f7c0-02f15f3c7c47).
